thread.title: Protivix Showcases “CRM and the Power of Customer Data” at the Gartner Symposium/ITxpo 2015
thread.title_full: Protivix Showcases “CRM and the Power of Customer Data” at the Gartner Symposium/ITxpo 2015

author: admin
title: Protivix Showcases “CRM and the Power of Customer Data” at the Gartner Symposium/ITxpo 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/10/2015 @ 12:53 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Protivix 
FRISCO, Texas -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Protivix is an Emerging Technologies sponsor and exhibitor at this year’s Gartner Symposium/ ITxpo, held at Walt Disney World in Orlando, Florida, October 4-8th. At the symposium the technology consultancy will showcase their solution on “CRM and the Power of Customer Data”, which helps organizations attain a 360 view of their customers and drive better interaction to increase sales and improve customer satisfaction. 
Protivix will also host strategy sessions on other solutions such as: Project & Portfolio Management: Portfolio Prioritization and Governance, Resource Capacity Planning, Resource Management and PPM Reporting with Project Online and Power BI. Business Intelligence: Leveraging internal, external and big data sources to provide actionable Reporting and Dashboards to the masses with the latest Microsoft BI technologies, including Power BI. 
“We are excited to be a part of such an exclusive event and meet the country’s top IT executives. Protivix partners with CIOs to help them navigate the ever changing technology landscape and provide practical experience to implement solutions their businesses demand. I look forward to establishing new partnerships at this event,” says Protivix founder and CEO, Richard Cano . 
“Being a former CIO, I know it’s important to realize the value in your investments and understand how to leverage their fullest capacity. Making the most of your budget is key for CIOs and technology leaders, and Protivix’ solutions help you deliver the most out of your budget spend,” says Bob Kerr , COO and VP of Protivix. 
The Gartner Symposium/ ITxpo is an industry-wide conference for top CIOs and their teams, showcasing the top technology solutions providers from around the globe in a variety of settings. The 2015 conference agenda is designed to provide attendees with the strategies, insights and tools needed to lead the next generation of IT and drive business outcomes. 
Protivix , a business solutions consulting firm since 2006, is a top technology solutions provider for Microsoft. Protivix specializes in Project & Portfolio Management, CRM and Business Intelligence solutions for medium to enterprise level organizations. Protivix is based in Frisco, Texas and has recently expanded operations into Houston and Atlanta, Georgia. 
For more information about this event or to schedule an interview with Richard Cano, please contact Dustin Torok at 469.850.6023 or dustin.torok@protivix.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150910006727/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
